data.text:
@lungisaximbi, @gillianoberholzer 

1. Please would you align the wording for the new field as it is offset to the field box.
2. When capturing a divorce order, it shows plaintiff and then respondent when it should be plaintiff and defendant.
3. When swapping the Case Type between Maintenance and Divorce Order, the fields do not change on the dependent section as they should. It behaves erratically when clicking next and back after selecting a different case type.
4. The new spousal maintenance amount field is not showing on maintenance substitution order sections.
